Name: Sherry Sour
Ingredients: 60 ml Lustau Palo Cortado Península Sherry
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The huge flavour of sherry is freshened by lemon juice and rounded by egg white.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2007 at Suba in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Sherry Sour contains 134 calories
